SEARCH
Package Game.HUD

Class Dummy

java.lang.Object
java.awt.event.MouseMotionAdapter
Game.HUD.Dummy
All Implemented Interfaces:
MouseMotionListener, EventListener
public class Dummy extends MouseMotionAdapter
The Dummy class represents a preview of a tower before placement on the map. It provides a visual representation of the tower's range and appearance.
